title: 5.0 magnitude quake jolts Swat, surrounding areas
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 26 (APP): A 5.0 magnitude earthquake struck Swat and nearby areas on Saturday, rushing the residents out of their homes and offices in fear.
According to the Pakistan Meteorological Department, the quake originated at a depth of 130 kilometres, with its epicentre located in Afghanistanâ€™s Hindu Kush region, as reported a private news channel.
Officials confirmed that no casualties or significant damage were reported following the tremors.
